aws_region.description: AWS region where org exists. e.g. us-east-1. Can be set with the `GENESYSCLOUD_REGION` environment variable.

oauthclient_id.description: OAuthClient ID found on the OAuth page of Admin UI. Can be set with the `GENESYSCLOUD_OAUTHCLIENT_ID` environment variable.

oauthclient_secret.description: OAuthClient secret found on the OAuth page of Admin UI. Can be set with the `GENESYSCLOUD_OAUTHCLIENT_SECRET` environment variable.

sdk_debug.description: Enables debug tracing in the Genesys Cloud SDK.

token_pool_size.description: Max number of OAuth tokens in the token pool. Can be set with the `GENESYSCLOUD_TOKEN_POOL_SIZE` environment variable.

default.description: Default value of the property. This is converted to the proper type for non-strings (e.g. set 'true' or 'false' for booleans).

type.description: Type of the property (boolean | string | integer | number).

block.description: Schema properties of the datatable. This must at a minimum contain a string property 'key' that will serve as the row key.
Genesys Cloud Architect Datatables

datatable_id.description: Datatable ID that contains this row. If this is changed, a new row is created.

key_value.description: Value for this row's key. If this is changed, a new row is created.

properties_json.description: JSON object containing properties and values for this row. Defaults will be set for missing properties.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Architect Datatable Row

home.description: True if this is the home division. This can be set to manage the pre-existing home division.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Authorization Division

default_role_id.description: Internal ID for an existing default role, e.g. 'employee'. This can be set to manage permissions on existing default roles.

name.description: Role name. This cannot be modified for default roles.

action_set.description: Actions allowed on the entity or '*' for all. e.g. 'add'

entity_name.description: Permission entity or '*' for all. e.g. 'user'

operator.description: Operator type (EQ | IN | GE | GT | LE | LT).

variable_name.description: Variable name being compared. This varies depending on the permission.

value.description: Value for operand. For USER or QUEUE types, use user_id or queue_id instead.

block.description: Operands for this condition.
Terms of the condition.
Conditions specific to this resource. This is only applicable to some permission types.
Role permission policies.
Genesys Cloud Authorization Role

member_ids.description: IDs of members assigned to the group. If not set, this resource will not manage group members.

owner_ids.description: IDs of owners of the group.

rules_visible.description: Are membership rules visible to the person requesting to view the group. Defaults to `true`.

type.description: Group type (official | social). This cannot be modified. Defaults to `official`.

visibility.description: Who can view this group (public | owners | members). Defaults to `public`.

number.description: Phone number for this contact type.

type.description: Contact type of the address. (GROUPRING | GROUPPHONE)

block.description: Contact numbers for this group.
Genesys Cloud Directory Group

group_id.description: Group ID that will be managed by this resource.

division_ids.description: Division IDs applied to this resource. If not set, the home division will be used. '*' may be set for all divisions.

block.description: Roles and their divisions assigned to this group.
Genesys Cloud Group Roles maintains group role assignments.

certificates.description: PEM or DER encoded public X.509 certificates for SAML signature validation.

disabled.description: True if ADFS is disabled. Defaults to `false`.

relying_party_identifier.description: String used to identify Genesys Cloud to ADFS.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Single Sign-on ADFS Identity Provider. See this page for detailed configuration instructions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-microsoft-adfs-single-sign-provider/

certificates.description: PEM or DER encoded public X.509 certificates for SAML signature validation.

disabled.description: True if Generic provider is disabled. Defaults to `false`.

endpoint_compression.description: True if the Genesys Cloud authentication request should be compressed. Defaults to `false`.

issuer_uri.description: Issuer URI provided by the provider.

name_identifier_format.description: SAML name identifier format. (urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:unspecified | urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:emailAddress | urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:X509SubjectName | urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:WindowsDomainQualifiedName | urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:kerberos | urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:entity | urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:persistent | urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:transient) Defaults to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:unspecified`.

relying_party_identifier.description: String used to identify Genesys Cloud to the identity provider.

target_uri.description: Target URI provided by the provider.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Single Sign-on Generic Identity Provider. See this page for detailed configuration instructions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-a-generic-single-sign-on-provider/

certificates.description: PEM or DER encoded public X.509 certificates for SAML signature validation.

disabled.description: True if GSuite is disabled. Defaults to `false`.

relying_party_identifier.description: String used to identify Genesys Cloud to GSuite.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Single Sign-on GSuite Identity Provider. See this page for detailed configuration instructions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-google-g-suite-single-sign-provider/

certificates.description: PEM or DER encoded public X.509 certificates for SAML signature validation.

disabled.description: True if Okta is disabled. Defaults to `false`.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Single Sign-on Okta Identity Provider. See this page for detailed configuration instructions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-okta-as-a-single-sign-on-provider/

certificates.description: PEM or DER encoded public X.509 certificates for SAML signature validation.

disabled.description: True if OneLogin is disabled. Defaults to `false`.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Single Sign-on OneLogin Identity Provider. See this page for detailed configuration instructions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-onelogin-as-single-sign-on-provider/

certificates.description: PEM or DER encoded public X.509 certificates for SAML signature validation.

disabled.description: True if Ping is disabled. Defaults to `false`.

relying_party_identifier.description: String used to identify Genesys Cloud to Ping.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Single Sign-on Ping Identity Provider. See this page for detailed configuration instructions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-ping-identity-single-sign-provider/

certificates.description: PEM or DER encoded public X.509 certificates for SAML signature validation.

disabled.description: True if Salesforce is disabled. Defaults to `false`.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Single Sign-on Salesforce Identity Provider. See this page for detailed configuration instructions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-salesforce-as-a-single-sign-on-provider/

intended_state.description: Integration state (ENABLED | DISABLED | DELETED). Defaults to `DISABLED`.

credentials.description: Credentials required for the integration. The required keys are indicated in the credentials property of the Integration Type.

block.description: Integration config. Each integration type has different schema, use [GET /api/v2/integrations/types/{typeId}/configschemas/{configType}](https://developer.mypurecloud.com/api/rest/v2/integrations/#get-api-v2-integrations-types--typeId--configschemas--configType-) to check schema, then use the correct attribute names for properties.
Genesys Cloud Integration

category.description: Category of action. Can be up to 256 characters long.

contract_input.description: JSON Schema that defines the body of the request that the client (edge/architect/postman) is sending to the service, on the /execute path. Changes will create a new action.

contract_output.description: JSON schema that defines the transformed, successful result that will be sent back to the caller. Changes will create a new action.

integration_id.description: The ID of the integration this action is associated with. Changes will create a new action.

name.description: Name of the action. Can be up to 256 characters long

secure.description: Indication of whether or not the action is designed to accept sensitive data. Changes will create a new action. Defaults to `false`.

headers.description: Map of headers in name, value pairs to include in request.

request_template.description: Velocity template to define request body sent to 3rd party service. Any instances of '${' must be properly escaped as '$${'

request_type.description: HTTP method to use for request (GET | PUT | POST | PATCH).

request_url_template.description: URL that may include placeholders for requests to 3rd party service.

block.description: Configuration of outbound request.

success_template.description: Velocity template to build response to return from Action. Any instances of '${' must be properly escaped as '$${'.

translation_map.description: Map 'attribute name' and 'JSON path' pairs used to extract data from REST response.

translation_map_defaults.description: Map 'attribute name' and 'default value' pairs used as fallback values if JSON path extraction fails for specified key.

block.description: Configuration of response processing.
Genesys Cloud Integration Actions. See this page for detailed information on configuring Actions: https://help.mypurecloud.com/articles/add-configuration-custom-actions-integrations/

credential_type_name.description: Credential type name. Use [GET /api/v2/integrations/credentials/types](https://developer.genesys.cloud/api/rest/v2/integrations/#get-api-v2-integrations-credentials-types) to see the list of available integration credential types.

fields.description: Credential fields. Different credential types require different fields. Missing any correct required fields will result API request failure. Use [GET /api/v2/integrations/credentials/types](https://developer.genesys.cloud/api/rest/v2/integrations/#get-api-v2-integrations-credentials-types) to check out the specific credential type schema to find out what fields are required.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Credential

path.description: A list of ancestor location IDs. This can be used to create sublocations.

state.description: Location state. Required for countries with states.

block.description: Address for this location. This cannot be changed while an emergency number is assigned.

type.description: Type of emergency number (default | elin). Defaults to `default`.

block.description: Emergency phone number for this location.
Genesys Cloud Location

custom_smtp_server_id.description: The ID of the custom SMTP server integration to use when sending outbound emails from this domain.

domain_id.description: Unique Id of the domain such as: 'example.com'. If subdomain is true, the Genesys Cloud regional domain is appended.

mail_from_domain.description: The custom MAIL FROM domain. This must be a subdomain of your email domain

subdomain.description: Indicates if this a Genesys Cloud sub-domain. If true, then the appropriate DNS records are created for sending/receiving email. Defaults to `false`.

block.description: Genesys Cloud Routing Email Domain

domain_id.description: ID of the routing domain such as: 'example.com'

flow_id.description: The flow to use for processing the email. This should not be set if a queue_id is specified.

from_email.description: The sender email to use for outgoing replies.

from_name.description: The sender name to use for outgoing replies.

language_id.description: The language to use for routing.

pattern.description: The search pattern that the mailbox name should match.

priority.description: The priority to use for routing.

queue_id.description: The queue to route the emails to. This should not be set if a flow_id is specified.

skill_ids.description: The skills to use for routing.

spam_flow_id.description: The flow to use for processing inbound emails that have been marked as spam.

block.description: The recipients that should be automatically blind copied on outbound emails associated with this route.
The route to use for email replies.
Genesys Cloud Routing Email Domain Route
Genesys Cloud Routing Language

acw_timeout_ms.description: The amount of time the agent can stay in ACW. Only set when ACW is MANDATORY_TIMEOUT, MANDATORY_FORCED_TIMEOUT or AGENT_REQUESTED.

acw_wrapup_prompt.description: This field controls how the UI prompts the agent for a wrapup (MANDATORY | OPTIONAL | MANDATORY_TIMEOUT | MANDATORY_FORCED_TIMEOUT | AGENT_REQUESTED). Defaults to `MANDATORY_TIMEOUT`.

auto_answer_only.description: Specifies whether the configured whisper should play for all ACD calls, or only for those which are auto-answered. Defaults to `true`.

calling_party_name.description: The name to use for caller identification for outbound calls from this queue.

calling_party_number.description: The phone number to use for caller identification for outbound calls from this queue.

default_script_ids.description: The default script IDs for each communication type. Communication types: (CALL | CALLBACK | CHAT | COBROWSE | EMAIL | MESSAGE | SOCIAL_EXPRESSION | VIDEO | SCREENSHARE)

division_id.description: The division to which this queue will belong. If not set, the home division will be used.

enable_manual_assignment.description: Indicates whether manual assignment is enabled for this queue. Defaults to `false`.

enable_transcription.description: Indicates whether voice transcription is enabled for this queue. Defaults to `false`.

members.description: Users in the queue. If not set, this resource will not manage members.

outbound_messaging_sms_address_id.description: The unique ID of the outbound messaging SMS address for the queue.

queue_flow_id.description: The in-queue flow ID to use for conversations waiting in queue.

skill_evaluation_method.description: The skill evaluation method to use when routing conversations (NONE | BEST | ALL). Defaults to `ALL`.

whisper_prompt_id.description: The prompt ID used for whisper on the queue, if configured.

wrapup_codes.description: IDs of wrapup codes assigned to this queue. If not set, this resource will not manage wrapup codes.

expansion_timeout_seconds.description: Seconds to wait in this ring before moving to the next.

skills_to_remove.description: Skill IDs to remove on ring exit.

block.description: The bullseye ring settings for the queue.

alerting_timeout_sec.description: Alerting timeout in seconds. Must be >= 7

service_level_duration_ms.description: Service Level target in milliseconds. Must be >= 1000

service_level_percentage.description: The desired Service Level. A float value between 0 and 1.

block.description: Call media settings.

alerting_timeout_sec.description: Alerting timeout in seconds. Must be >= 7

service_level_duration_ms.description: Service Level target in milliseconds. Must be >= 1000

service_level_percentage.description: The desired Service Level. A float value between 0 and 1.

block.description: Callback media settings.

alerting_timeout_sec.description: Alerting timeout in seconds. Must be >= 7

service_level_duration_ms.description: Service Level target in milliseconds. Must be >= 1000

service_level_percentage.description: The desired Service Level. A float value between 0 and 1.

block.description: Chat media settings.

alerting_timeout_sec.description: Alerting timeout in seconds. Must be >= 7

service_level_duration_ms.description: Service Level target in milliseconds. Must be >= 1000

service_level_percentage.description: The desired Service Level. A float value between 0 and 1.

block.description: Email media settings.

alerting_timeout_sec.description: Alerting timeout in seconds. Must be >= 7

service_level_duration_ms.description: Service Level target in milliseconds. Must be >= 1000

service_level_percentage.description: The desired Service Level. A float value between 0 and 1.

block.description: Message media settings.

alerting_timeout_sec.description: Alerting timeout in seconds. Must be >= 7

service_level_duration_ms.description: Service Level target in milliseconds. Must be >= 1000

service_level_percentage.description: The desired Service Level. A float value between 0 and 1.

block.description: Social media settings.

alerting_timeout_sec.description: Alerting timeout in seconds. Must be >= 7

service_level_duration_ms.description: Service Level target in milliseconds. Must be >= 1000

service_level_percentage.description: The desired Service Level. A float value between 0 and 1.

block.description: Video media settings.

domain_id.description: Unique ID of the email domain. e.g. "test.example.com"

route_id.description: Unique ID of the email route.

block.description: The outbound email address settings for this queue.

operator.description: Matching operator (MEETS_THRESHOLD | ANY). MEETS_THRESHOLD matches any agent with a score at or above the rule's threshold. ANY matches all specified agents, regardless of score. Defaults to `MEETS_THRESHOLD`.

threshold.description: Threshold required for routing attempt (generally an agent score). Ignored for operator ANY.

wait_seconds.description: Seconds to wait in this rule before moving to the next. Defaults to `5`.

block.description: The routing rules for the queue, used for routing to known or preferred agents.
Genesys Cloud Routing Queue
Genesys Cloud Routing Skill

include_non_acd.description: Block this media type when on a non-ACD conversation. Defaults to `false`.

interruptible_media_types.description: Set of other media types that can interrupt this media type (call | callback | chat | email | message | videoComm).

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum capacity of conversations of this media type. Value must be between 1 and 25.

block.description: Call media settings. If not set, this reverts to the default media type settings.

include_non_acd.description: Block this media type when on a non-ACD conversation. Defaults to `false`.

interruptible_media_types.description: Set of other media types that can interrupt this media type (call | callback | chat | email | message | videoComm).

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum capacity of conversations of this media type. Value must be between 1 and 25.

block.description: Callback media settings. If not set, this reverts to the default media type settings.

include_non_acd.description: Block this media type when on a non-ACD conversation. Defaults to `false`.

interruptible_media_types.description: Set of other media types that can interrupt this media type (call | callback | chat | email | message | videoComm).

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum capacity of conversations of this media type. Value must be between 1 and 25.

block.description: Chat media settings. If not set, this reverts to the default media type settings.

include_non_acd.description: Block this media type when on a non-ACD conversation. Defaults to `false`.

interruptible_media_types.description: Set of other media types that can interrupt this media type (call | callback | chat | email | message | videoComm).

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum capacity of conversations of this media type. Value must be between 1 and 25.

block.description: Email media settings. If not set, this reverts to the default media type settings.

include_non_acd.description: Block this media type when on a non-ACD conversation. Defaults to `false`.

interruptible_media_types.description: Set of other media types that can interrupt this media type (call | callback | chat | email | message | videoComm).

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum capacity of conversations of this media type. Value must be between 1 and 25.

block.description: Message media settings. If not set, this reverts to the default media type settings.

include_non_acd.description: Block this media type when on a non-ACD conversation. Defaults to `false`.

interruptible_media_types.description: Set of other media types that can interrupt this media type (call | callback | chat | email | message | videoComm).

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum capacity of conversations of this media type. Value must be between 1 and 25.

block.description: Video media settings. If not set, this reverts to the default media type settings.
Genesys Cloud Org-wide Routing Utilization Settings.
Genesys Cloud Routing Wrapup Code

directory.description: Directory where the config and state files will be exported. Defaults to `./genesyscloud`.

exclude_attributes.description: Attributes to exclude from the config when exporting resources. Each value should be of the form {resource_name}.{attribute}, e.g. 'genesyscloud_user.skills'. Excluded attributes must be optional.

include_state_file.description: Export a 'terraform.tfstate' file along with the config file. This can be used for orgs to begin managing existing resources with terraform. Defaults to `false`.

resource_types.description: Resource types to export, e.g. 'genesyscloud_user'. Defaults to all exportable types.

block.description:
Genesys Cloud Resource to export Terraform config and (optionally) tfstate files to a local directory. 
		The config file is named 'genesyscloud.tf.json', and the state file is named 'terraform.tfstate'.

addresses.description: The address settings for this user. If not set, this resource will not manage addresses.

certifications.description: Certifications for this user. If not set, this resource will not manage certifications.

division_id.description: The division to which this user will belong. If not set, the home division will be used.

employer_info.description: The employer info for this user. If not set, this resource will not manage employer info.

locations.description: The user placement at each site location. If not set, this resource will not manage user locations.

manager.description: User ID of this user's manager.

password.description: User's password. If specified, this is only set on user create.

profile_skills.description: Profile skills for this user. If not set, this resource will not manage profile skills.

routing_languages.description: Languages and proficiencies for this user. If not set, this resource will not manage user languages.

routing_skills.description: Skills and proficiencies for this user. If not set, this resource will not manage user skills.

routing_utilization.description: The routing utilization settings for this user. If empty list, the org default settings are used. If not set, this resource will not manage the users's utilization settings.

state.description: User's state (active | inactive). Default is 'active'. Defaults to `active`.

block.description: Genesys Cloud User

user_id.description: User ID that will be managed by this resource.

division_ids.description: Division IDs applied to this resource. If not set, the home division will be used. '*' may be set for all divisions.

block.description: Roles and their divisions assigned to this user.
Genesys Cloud User Roles maintains user role assignments.
Data source for Genesys Cloud Divisions. Select a division by name.
Data source for Genesys Cloud Roles. Select a role by name.
Data source for Genesys Cloud Routing Languages. Select a language by name.
Data source for Genesys Cloud Routing Skills. Select a skill by name.
Data source for Genesys Cloud Users. Select a user by email or name.
